frontmatter.title: Don't Get Me Wrong
frontmatter.description: Being misunderstood is one of my greatest fears. In this post, I explore three types of misunderstanding: from the curious kind when people genuinely want to learn, to the willful kind when people choose not to understand. I share my personal journey of making peace with inevitable misinterpretations, and how coaching others taught me that sometimes, misunderstandings reveal more about what truly matters to the listener.
